response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item carries a value of $800,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $720,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. I trust this proposal will meet your financial considerations while securing your access to a high-quality solution. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 720000}
